abstract: Swiss Reinsurance, the biggest reinsurer in the world, said the billionaire investor Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway took a 3 percent stake and will assume a share of its non-life business, giving Swiss Re’s shares their biggest spike in four years.
lead_paragraph: Swiss Reinsurance, the biggest reinsurer in the world, said the billionaire investor Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway took a 3 percent stake and will assume a share of its non-life business, giving Swiss Re’s shares their biggest spike in four years.

headline.main: Buffett’s Berkshire Takes 3% Stake in Swiss Re
